summary: Though the MICHELIN Guide is most well-known for its dining expertise, it also offers hotel recommendations and booking services, which will also be available on Apple Maps. The Golf Digest integration on Maps will function similarly, allowing users to filter their searches to find recommended golf courses — but we imagine more users will be looking for places to eat, rather than to tee off. These partners will also contribute to Apple Maps’ curated guides, which can help travelers find their way to top destinations on a visit.
